settings.imgtxt:
Kodiak is one of the largest suppliers of custom engraved promotional products in the United States.

In business since 2015, it's been our mission is to help share spread the word about your business or even through promo products that people actually want to keep.

Our innovative products include a variety of premium grade stainless steel drinkware, from engraved tumblers, water bottles, coffee mugs, wine cups and much more! 

Using industry leading laser engraving and UV Printing equipment, we've quickly become known as the leader in quality when it comes to premium promotional goods.

Through our massive growth, we've been able to offer all of our premium promotional goods at competitive low prices, low minimal order quantities, and top notch quality, making our custom logo drinkware the perfect fit for employee and client gifts, giveaways, and memorable gifts that simply elevate the art of giving.

We look forward to helping your business grow through premium custom logo drinkware.

settings.subheading:
Kodiak Coolers help companies create Laser Engraved Custom
logo promotional products that make your brand stand out.

settings.title: Is there a setup fee?
settings.answer: No! We are one of the only companies in the industry does not charge a setup fee!

settings.title: Will I receive a proof before my order is started?
settings.answer: Yes! Once you place your order and submit your artwork, our team will provide a digital mockup for you to confirm within 24-48 hours of how your logo will look on the drinkware!

settings.title: Do you have a Minimal Order Quantity?
settings.answer: Yes we do have a minimal order of $200 per order. This breaks down to around 12-16 units depending on the pricing of the product you are ordering!

settings.title: Are these quality products?
settings.answer: Yes - All of our promotional drinkware  are made from Premium Double Walled Vacuum Sealed Stainless Steel and customized using State-Of-Art Laser Engraving and UV Printed logo methods we have engineered over the past 5 years.

settings.title: Are your products dishwasher safe?
settings.answer: All of our drinkware are vacuum sealed so we recommend hand washing the cups/tumblers to preserve the integrity of the cup and promote overall longevity.

settings.title: Can I order multiple colors and styles together?
settings.answer: Yes! You can combine any variation of colors and cup styles together to achieve the minimal order of $200.

settings.title: How much is shipping?
settings.answer:
Shipping is based on weight but is normally around $1 / unit.

All orders over $2000 will receive Free Shipping!

settings.title: How long is production time?
settings.answer: Production time will vary but our team works Monday - Friday and ship 100's of orders out every day. Standard production time is 1-2 weeks. If you need your items faster, please contact us at help@kodiak-coolers.com or let us know ASAP after you place your order so we can make sure you receive your order in time.

settings.title: What happens after my order is placed?
settings.answer:
After you place your order we will send an onboarding email that you can reply with your logo file if you did not upload during the order process.

From there, our team will provide a digital mockup within 24-48 hours for you to confirm of your logo on the drinkware to ensure you are 100% satisfied with how the logo will look.

Finally your items will go into production (1-2 weeks on average unless expedited request) and ship via UPS.

You will receive your drinkware roughly 1-4 days after they ship depending on your location in the USA!
